topic.body: hey heyo. gonna try out zeronet also ^^. and so there's my newly created site: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1E8Z8sk3cGeWdQumBaYEh6LraqC2BRnutV/

topic.title: there you go, next site named "Dream Search" :)

1547044209_13SFxfKtzbvyUWADdNZs3oKh1YSJw.body: this site uses WebTorrent and which uses WebRTC and u can check ur browser compatibility here: https://caniuse.com/#feat=rtcpeerconnection

Added slices player on Zombieland Saga dubbed ep1, that means it plays slices of video that are spread to some web servers(right now only one :P), tried on gecko and webkit engines so ill hope it works almost good :)

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_35_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): @lavaphox is it on your todo list to make the search function working?For example on side of the site i see video "Lost and Found" so i search for "Found" and that does not return any video..

damn i couldn't find prob on firefox with search even when redownloading site. but i noticed that when first running it doesnt show any anime :P. and also imma drop webtorrent support. oh and about that lost and found, do u have hidden folder called "lost and found" in 1E8Z8sk3cGeWdQumBaYEh6LraqC2BRnutV/anime/ folder ?

1552510374_13SFxfKtzbvyUWADdNZs3oKh1YSJw.body: bingooo @ssdifnskdjfnsdjk site has crawled data zipped that server crawls 24/7 (not only 0list, every site it finds like regular spider), hopefully everyday update. also ty for mentioning out 2 probs :), gonna add more features as time goes on. and as development is open theres git repo: https://gitlab.com/l4v4ph0x/dream-search

important notes how crawler works(and its gonna get better hopefully :P) ,  to get best score i've written down elements wut crawler is searching
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion/searchMetas.txt

or feature like if site has .bit domain then result would be ? :D :
13CgSQeywg2ius5pjXVCk7dKUCRkz5xvW3 | ssdifnskdjfnsdjk.blocklist.bit

1571269122_1LJMKSLPgM8fqQSMRrLzWB2DhVm1z.body:
it would be better if ud cached searches to zeronet website or make it connect and get search results out by using secure web socket. for my view its not acceptable to leave administrative tab for user to edit :P

sorry if it offends u but i mean no bad feelings just trying to get u to better road ^^
